page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName is a rapid fire Energy weapon, that fires phaser bolts. It also allows the player to zoom in for higher accuracy.

page.title: Customization
page.text: Like most energy weapons the $itemName can be rapidly recharged by [item name=energy_pack], overhead if fired continually without stopping and can be upgraded using weapon modules at the [block name=weapon_station].
The $itemName allows for all types of weapon modules including weapon sights.

page.title: Stats
page.text: The $itemName can also be dropped by Ranged Rogue Androids. There are also Legendary versions of the rifle dropped only by Legendary Rogue Androids. The Legendary versions can have increased base stats that can stack with weapon modules. Stats such as higher meta fire rate and greater accuracy.
